Articles.Content:
you should check if you can write to disk, and if you cannt display an error (ea disk full, unable to write file ), also check if a file has been written, and didnt fail.
-quick saves, ship saves, save games.

i'm sure in return you get a lot less crash reports.
Its verry common to do such checks, those are the little programming errors that you in general dont want if you operate so many installed apps in the field.
